root.name: Daruman Busters
root.description: Overview Daruman Busters is a block matching puzzler in which blocks line the sides of the screen. The player controls two little men up and down on the side of the screen, by pressing A or B they will hit the blocks right or left. If they hit a matching block then those blocks, and any of the same type nearby, will disappear. The goal is to get the daruman on the ground before he manages to rise up to the girl on top of the screen.
